title: "Starter code for job desc scrape"
output:
  pdf_document: default
  html_notebook: default
---
 

```{r} 
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(xml2)
library(here)
```


```{r}

url <- "https://www.indeed.com/jobs?q=Data+Scientist&l=New+York%2C+NY"
page <- xml2::read_html(url)


title <- page %>% 
  rvest::html_nodes('[data-tn-element="jobTitle"]') %>%
  rvest::html_attr("title") %>%
  stringi::stri_trim_both()
 
summary <- page %>%
  rvest::html_nodes('.summary') %>% 
  rvest::html_text() %>%
  stringi::stri_trim_both()

page_result_start <- 10 # starting page 
page_result_end <- 190 # last page results
page_results <- seq(from = page_result_start, to = page_result_end, by = 10)

full_df <- data.frame(title= title, summary=summary)
```
